entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
